member.name: T:HMConnection.Utilities.Mail
member.summary: Simple object to send emails through SMTP Server.

member.name: M:HMConnection.Utilities.Mail.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Default Constructor.

member.name: M:HMConnection.Utilities.Mail.SendMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Web.Mail.MailPriority,System.Web.Mail.MailFormat,System.String[])
member.summary: Sends an email through the setup smtp mail server.
member.param: The email address to send the message to.
The formatting that should be used for the message body.
A string array containing the paths of all the attachments.
member.returns: The result of the request. [Message Sent] if not problems encountered. [No SMTP Server Configured, Contact Administrator] if smtp server not setup in the WEB->System_Ctrl table. Any other message would be from a caught exception.

member.name: T:HMConnection.HMCon
member.summary: Connection Object used to Store Connection Strings and Database Names. Also stores Some User Info and Application Flags.

member.name: M:HMConnection.HMCon.UpdateConnectionSettingsFile(System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates connection string to either use active direcotry or the encrypted username and password from HMLogin.txt

member.name: M:HMConnection.HMCon.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates and builds the Connection Objedt and Sets only the Web Connection and Contact ID. This allows for a non-company specific HMCon and will not set MLUser and Department

member.name: M:HMConnection.HMCon.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of hmconnection to provide access to the database utils for sql execs

member.name: M:HMConnection.HMCon.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates and builds the Connection Object and Sets all Connection Strings , Database Names, Company User Name, Contact ID, Department and Company ID

member.name: M:HMConnection.HMCon.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and builds the Connection Object and Sets all Connection Strings , Database Names, Company User Name, Contact ID, Department and Company ID

member.summary: Creates and builds the Connection Object and Sets all Connection Strings , Database Names, Company User Name, Contact ID, Department and Company ID + adds an ICredential object and updates the connectionsync table

member.name: M:HMConnection.HMCon.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)

member.param: Style for Security (KickinIt DB Column Name)

The SqlCommand wait time before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error.
